post:
A quality web-hosting provider will make sure your website is always up and running and that is just what we do at SemoWeb.  With the best uptime, virtual dedicated server plans, quality support and superior RAID-10 systems anyone can ask for, we are your best bet for a web-hosting provider.

Our experts are always working to meet the needs of our clients.  We are not just experienced in what we do, but we are a steadily growing web-hosting company that will not only meet but exceed your expectations.  This is why you should choose SemoWeb as your web-hosting provider.  Understanding what customers want is why we are a success.    

Our team of specialists can provide you with shared hosting, reseller hosting, VPS hosting, and so much more!  We strive for customer satisfaction.  Our philosophy is, if our clients are happy then we are executing our job appropriately.  We only use the most reliable server-grade hardware so all your data is secured … including excellent Disk I./O.  As all of our VPS are stored in an unfailing datacenter for optimal protection, you will never have to worry.  SemoWeb uses RAID-10 protected drives to maintain a safe place for your data even in the occasion of hard drive failure.  We do not want our customers to have to worry about their data being lost as such we have implemented RAID-10, as you can see we have put the best system in place.  

One that will always be there for you when you need them and that is what we accomplish each and every day.  SemoWeb offers many web-hosting plans for client convenience; as well as, a 30-day money back guarantee for anything less than 100% satisfaction for our shared/reseller services.  Instant activation for your web-hosting plan is how we like to begin our web-hosting relationship with our customers.  It is more than important to have a web-host provider that you can trust.  

We offer first class support for all of our clients, our uptime is top notch, and our backup system is more than anyone will ever need (Shared hosting/re-sellers are constantly backed up).  We offer 24/7 phone support so you will never be without assistance regardless of the time of day or night.  We take the hassle and headache out of web hosting and give you the reliable services that you desire.  The hardware we use is the best and handpicked for the finest amenities for our customers.  Not to mention, we offer the best web hosting features out there.  Of course, other companies out there that can offer similar services, but we feel we offer more dedication to our customers individually.  We provide a loyalty to all of our clients that no other company can compare to.  When our customers have a problem, we take that problem as our own.        

The price of SemoWeb is more than reasonable.  We offer budget prices for all of our services and do not abandon quality for the cheaper price tag.  With SemoWeb as your web-hosting provider, you will have 99.99% of uptime guaranteed!  Make SemoWeb your web-hosting provider and experience a life of ease. Start today, have a look at our available limited time plans below!

This special is set up instantly and we accept 2CO, Alert Pay, PayPal -- plentiful payment options just for you!

SemoWeb is 4 years old and steadily growing, lets begin our partnership.
